attributes.action: Urgently review the laws pertaining to Surrogacy in the UK as many groups of childless people are currently excluded.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sign this Petition if you wish to support:-

a) Financial Assistance for people seeking to start families via Surrogacy.
b) Freedom to advertise for Surrogates and Intended Parents.
c) An end to arbitrary discrimination based on age, culture, race, disability, criminal records, and ability to pay, against those seeking parenthood.
d) Proper recognition of the legal rights of both Surrogates and Intended Parents.
e) Enforceable in law Surrogacy Arrangement Contracts.
f) Proper education and training for Health Care Professionals and Social  Services departments regarding Surrogacy.
g) To promote a general wider acceptance for the use of Surrogacy.
